import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react";
import Link from "~/components/Link";
import { __t, getTranslation } from "~/utils/translate";

import { iconBankDomestic } from "./component/iconDataDomestic";
import { CounterDataDifference } from "./component/countDataDifference";

import { seoMeta } from "~/utils/seo";
import type { Route } from "../+types/home";
import axios from "axios";
import { dataScroll } from "./component/dataLogo";

export const contactMetaSEO: any = {
  de: {
    title: "",
    description: "",
    breadcrumb: {
      home: "Home",
      contact: "Contact",
    },
  },
  en: {
    title: "",
    description: "",
    breadcrumb: {
      home: "Home",
      contact: "Contact",
    },
  },
  fr: {
    title: "",
    description: "",
    breadcrumb: {
      home: "Home",
      contact: "Contact",
    },
  },
  ja: {
    title: "",
    description: "",
    breadcrumb: {
      home: "Home",
      contact: "Contact",
    },
  },
  ko: {
    title: "",
    description: "",
    breadcrumb: {
      home: "Home",
      contact: "Contact",
    },
  },
  vi: {
    title: "",
    description: "",
    breadcrumb: {
      home: "Trang chủ",
      contact: "Tin tức",
    },
  },
  "zh-CN": {
    title: "",
    description: "",
    breadcrumb: {
      home: "Home",
      contact: "Contact",
    },
  },
  "zh-TW": {
    title: "",
    description: "",
    breadcrumb: {
      home: "Home",
      contact: "Contact",
    },
  },
};
export function meta({ params, matches }: any) {
  const rootMatch = matches.find((match: any) => match.id === "root");
  // @ts-ignore
  const ENV = rootMatch?.data?.ENV;
  let origin = ENV.APP_URL;
  let lang = params.lang;
  let url = origin + `/${lang}/contact`;

  let defaultLang = "en";
  let metaTitle =
    contactMetaSEO[lang] != undefined
      ? contactMetaSEO[lang]["title"]
      : contactMetaSEO[defaultLang]["title"];
  let metaDescription =
    contactMetaSEO[lang] != undefined
      ? contactMetaSEO[lang]["description"]
      : contactMetaSEO[defaultLang]["description"];

  return seoMeta(origin, url, metaTitle, metaDescription);
}
export const loader = async ({ params, request }: Route.LoaderArgs) => {
  let lang = params.lang;

  let defaultLang = "en";
  let schemaName =
    contactMetaSEO[lang] != undefined
      ? contactMetaSEO[lang]["title"]
      : contactMetaSEO[defaultLang]["title"];
  let schemaDescription =
    contactMetaSEO[lang] != undefined
      ? contactMetaSEO[lang]["description"]
      : contactMetaSEO[defaultLang]["description"];
  let schemaBreadcrumbHome =
    contactMetaSEO[lang] != undefined
      ? contactMetaSEO[lang]["breadcrumb"]["home"]
      : contactMetaSEO[defaultLang]["breadcrumb"]["home"];
  let schemaBreadcrumbContact =
    contactMetaSEO[lang] != undefined
      ? contactMetaSEO[lang]["breadcrumb"]["contact"]
      : contactMetaSEO[defaultLang]["breadcrumb"]["contact"];

  const jsonLdData = {
    "@context": "https://schema.org",
    "@type": "ContactPage",
    "@id": `https://pcs-logistics.com/${lang}/contact`,
    url: `https://pcs-logistics.com/${lang}/contact`,
    name: schemaName,
    isPartOf: { "@id": "#website" },
    description: schemaDescription,
    breadcrumb: {
      "@type": "BreadcrumbList",
      itemListElement: [
        {
          "@type": "ListItem",
          position: 1,
          name: schemaBreadcrumbHome,
          item: `https://pcs-logistics.com/${lang}`,
        },
        {
          "@type": "ListItem",
          position: 2,
          name: schemaBreadcrumbContact,
          item: `https://pcs-logistics.com/${lang}/contact`,
        },
      ],
    },
  };
  return {
    jsonLdData: jsonLdData,
    apiUrl: process.env.API_URL,
  };
};
const DomesticExpress = () => {
  //API
  const { jsonLdData, apiUrl } = useLoaderData();

  const [openMessage, setOpenMessage] = useState({
    icon: <div />,
    title: "",
    description: "",
  });
  const [loadingSubmit, setLoadingSubmit] = useState(false);
  const handleSubmitFormBusinessSale = async () => {
    if (loadingSubmit) {
      return;
    }
    let elName: any = document.querySelector("#name_business_sale_priority");
    let elService: any = document.querySelector(
      "#service_business_sale_priority"
    );
    let elPhone: any = document.querySelector("#phone_business_sale_priority");
    let elEmail: any = document.querySelector("#email_business_sale_priority");
    let elCompany: any = document.querySelector(
      "#company_business_sale_priority"
    );
    let elNote: any = document.querySelector("#note_business_sale_priority");

    let name = elName?.value;
    let service = elService?.value;
    let phone = elPhone?.value;
    let email = elEmail?.value;
    let company = elCompany?.value;
    let note = elNote?.value;
    if (!name || !email) {
      setOpenMessage({
        icon: (
          <div className="mx-auto flex size-12 shrink-0 items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-red-100 sm:mx-0 sm:size-10">
            <svg
              className="size-6 text-red-600"
              fill="none"
              viewBox="0 0 24 24"
              strokeWidth="1.5"
              stroke="currentColor"
              aria-hidden="true"
              data-slot="icon"
            >
              <path
                strokeLinecap="round"
                strokeLinejoin="round"
                d="M12 9v3.75m-9.303 3.376c-.866 1.5.217 3.374 1.948 3.374h14.71c1.73 0 2.813-1.874 1.948-3.374L13.949 3.378c-.866-1.5-3.032-1.5-3.898 0L2.697 16.126ZM12 15.75h.007v.008H12v-.008Z"
              />
            </svg>
          </div>
        ),
        title: __t("contact_us.title_1", translations),
        description: __t("contact_us.description_1", translations),
      });
      return;
    }
    setLoadingSubmit(true);
    try {
      let payload = {
        form_type: "business_sale",
        name: name,
        service: "",
        phone: phone,
        company: company,
        email: email,
        note: note,
      };
      let response = await axios.post(`${apiUrl}/pcs-global/contact`, payload, {
        headers: {
          Accept: "application/json",
          "Content-Type": "application/json",
        },
      });

      if (response.data.status) {
        setOpenMessage({
          icon: (
            <div className="mx-auto flex size-12 shrink-0 items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-[#dcfce7] sm:mx-0 sm:size-10">
              <svg
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                fill="none"
                viewBox="0 0 24 24"
                strokeWidth="1.5"
                stroke="currentColor"
                aria-hidden="true"
                data-slot="icon"
                className="text-[#00a63e] w-[20px]"
              >
                <path
                  strokeLinecap="round"
                  strokeLinejoin="round"
                  d="m4.5 12.75 6 6 9-13.5"
                ></path>
              </svg>
            </div>
          ),
          title: __t("contact_us.title_2", translations),
          description: __t("contact_us.description_2", translations),
        });
        elName.value = "";
        elPhone.value = "";
        elCompany.value = "";
        elEmail.value = "";
        elNote.value = "";
      } else {
        setOpenMessage({
          icon: (
            <div className="mx-auto flex size-12 shrink-0 items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-red-100 sm:mx-0 sm:size-10">
              <svg
                className="size-6 text-red-600"
                fill="none"
                viewBox="0 0 24 24"
                strokeWidth="1.5"
                stroke="currentColor"
                aria-hidden="true"
                data-slot="icon"
              >
                <path
                  strokeLinecap="round"
                  strokeLinejoin="round"
                  d="M12 9v3.75m-9.303 3.376c-.866 1.5.217 3.374 1.948 3.374h14.71c1.73 0 2.813-1.874 1.948-3.374L13.949 3.378c-.866-1.5-3.032-1.5-3.898 0L2.697 16.126ZM12 15.75h.007v.008H12v-.008Z"
                />
              </svg>
            </div>
          ),
          title: __t("contact_us.title_3", translations),
          description: __t("contact_us.description_3", translations),
        });
      }
    } catch (e) {
      console.log(e);
      setOpenMessage({
        icon: (
          <div className="mx-auto flex size-12 shrink-0 items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-red-100 sm:mx-0 sm:size-10">
            <svg
              className="size-6 text-red-600"
              fill="none"
              viewBox="0 0 24 24"
              strokeWidth="1.5"
              stroke="currentColor"
              aria-hidden="true"
              data-slot="icon"
            >
              <path
                strokeLinecap="round"
                strokeLinejoin="round"
                d="M12 9v3.75m-9.303 3.376c-.866 1.5.217 3.374 1.948 3.374h14.71c1.73 0 2.813-1.874 1.948-3.374L13.949 3.378c-.866-1.5-3.032-1.5-3.898 0L2.697 16.126ZM12 15.75h.007v.008H12v-.008Z"
              />
            </svg>
          </div>
        ),
        title: __t("contact_us.title_3", translations),
        description: __t("contact_us.description_3", translations),
      });
    }
    setLoadingSubmit(false);
  };
  //lang
  const matches = useMatches();
  const translations = getTranslation(matches);
  //detail diffrence
  const detailDiffrence = [
    {
      icon: (
        <svg
          width="48"
          height="48"
          viewBox="0 0 48 48"
          fill="none"
          xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
        >
          <path

            fill="white"
            stroke="white"
            stroke-width="0.5"
          />
        </svg>
      ),
      number: "300",
      unit: "+",
      content: "solutions.domestic-express.trans",
    },
  ];
  //history customer
  const imgHistoryCustomer = [
    {
      image: "/images/example/img_domestic-express_history_customer_1.png",
    },
    {
      image: "/images/example/img_domestic-express_history_customer_2.png",
    },
    {
      image: "/images/example/img_domestic-express_history_customer_3.png",
    },
  ];
  const [currentIndex, setCurrentIndex] = useState(0);
  const nextSlide = () => {
    setCurrentIndex((prevIndex) =>
      prevIndex === imgHistoryCustomer.length - 1 ? 0 : prevIndex + 1
    );
  };
  const prevSlide = () => {
    setCurrentIndex((prevIndex) =>
      prevIndex === 0 ? imgHistoryCustomer.length - 1 : prevIndex - 1
    );
  };
  useEffect(() => {
    const interval = setInterval(() => {
      nextSlide();
    }, 3000);
    return () => clearInterval(interval);
  }, []);
  // is mobile 1024px
  const [isMobile1024, setIsMobile1024] = useState(false);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (typeof window !== "undefined") {
      setIsMobile1024(window.innerWidth <= 1024);

      const handleResize1024 = () => {
        setIsMobile1024(window.innerWidth <= 1024);
      };

      window.addEventListener("resize", handleResize1024);
      return () => window.removeEventListener("resize", handleResize1024);
    }
  }, []);
  const [isMobile, setIsMobile] = useState(false);

  useEffect(() => {
    const checkScreenSize = () => {
      setIsMobile(window.innerWidth <= 1024);
    };

    checkScreenSize();
    window.addEventListener("resize", checkScreenSize);

    return () => {
      window.removeEventListener("resize", checkScreenSize);
    };
  }, []);
  const historyCustomer = [
    {
      avatar: "/images/example/img_domestic-express_history_customer_ava_1.png",
      title: "solutions.domestic-express.story_1",
      content: "solutions.domestic-express.story_1_content",
      name: "solutions.domestic-express.story_1_name",
      company: "solutions.domestic-express.story_1_company",
    },
    {
      avatar: "/images/example/img_domestic-express_history_customer_ava_1.png",
      title: "solutions.domestic-express.story_2",
      content: "solutions.domestic-express.story_2_content",
      name: "solutions.domestic-express.story_2_name",
      company: "solutions.domestic-express.story_2_company",
    },
    {
      avatar: "/images/example/img_domestic-express_history_customer_ava_1.png",
      title: "solutions.domestic-express.story_3",
      content: "solutions.domestic-express.story_3_content",
      name: "solutions.domestic-express.story_3_name",
      company: "solutions.domestic-express.story_3_company",
    },
  ];
  const [currentIndexHistory, setCurrentIndexHistory] = useState(0);
  const nextSlideHistory = () => {
    setCurrentIndexHistory((prevIndex) =>
      prevIndex === historyCustomer.length - 1 ? 0 : prevIndex + 1
    );
  };
  const prevSlideHistory = () => {
    setCurrentIndexHistory((prevIndex) =>
      prevIndex === 0 ? historyCustomer.length - 1 : prevIndex - 1
    );
  };
  useEffect(() => {
    const interval = setInterval(() => {
      setCurrentIndexHistory((prevIndex) =>
        prevIndex === historyCustomer.length - 1 ? 0 : prevIndex + 1
      );
    }, 5000);

    return () => clearInterval(interval);
  }, []);
  //questions
  const questions = [
    {
      question: "solutions.domestic-express.question_1",
      answer: "solutions.domestic-express.question_1_content",
      link: "https://pcs-logistics.com/vi/news/does-pcs-offer-home-pickup-services",
    },
    {
      question: "solutions.domestic-express.question_2",
      answer: "solutions.domestic-express.question_2_content",
      link: "https://pcs-logistics.com/vi/news/does-pcs-offer-sameday-delivery-services",
    },
    {
      question: "solutions.domestic-express.question_3",
      answer: "solutions.domestic-express.question_3_content",
      link: "https://pcs-logistics.com/vi/news/does-pcs-have-a-weight-limit-for-shipments",
    },
    {
      question: "solutions.domestic-express.question_4",
      answer: "solutions.domestic-express.question_4_content",
      link: "https://pcs-logistics.com/vi/news/how-can-i-check-my-shipment-status",
    },
    {
      question: "solutions.domestic-express.question_5",
      answer: "solutions.domestic-express.question_5_content",
      link: "https://pcs-logistics.com/vi/news/does-pcs-offer-cash-on-delivery-cod-services",
    },
  ];
  const [openIndex, setOpenIndex] = useState<number | null>(0);
  const toggleQuestion = (index: number) => {
    setOpenIndex(openIndex === index ? null : index);
  };
  const [isMobile768, setIsMobile768] = useState(false);

  useEffect(() => {
    const checkScreenSize = () => {
      setIsMobile768(window.innerWidth <= 768);
    };

    checkScreenSize();
    window.addEventListener("resize", checkScreenSize);

    return () => {
      window.removeEventListener("resize", checkScreenSize);
    };
  }, []);
  // chọn căn giữa:
  const buttonRefs = useRef<(HTMLDivElement | null)[]>([]);
  const buttonSelectedContainer = useRef<HTMLDivElement | null>(null);

  const smoothScrollTo = (
    element: HTMLElement,
    target: number,
    duration: number
  ) => {
    const start = element.scrollLeft;
    const change = target - start;
    const startTime = performance.now();

    const animateScroll = (currentTime: number) => {
      const elapsed = currentTime - startTime;
      const progress = Math.min(elapsed / duration, 1);

      element.scrollLeft = start + change * easeInOutQuad(progress);

      if (progress < 1) {
        requestAnimationFrame(animateScroll);
      }
    };

    const easeInOutQuad = (t: number) =>
      t < 0.5 ? 2 * t * t : -1 + (4 - 2 * t) * t;

    requestAnimationFrame(animateScroll);
  };

  const handleScrollToCenter = (index: number) => {
    setSelected(detailSolution[index]);

    const container = buttonSelectedContainer.current;
    const button = buttonRefs.current[index];

    if (container && button) {
      const containerWidth = container.clientWidth;
      const buttonWidth = button.clientWidth;
      const buttonLeft = button.scrollLeft; // Lấy vị trí thực tế của button trong container
      console.log(container.scrollLeft);
      const scrollLeft = buttonLeft - containerWidth / 2 + buttonWidth / 2;

      smoothScrollTo(container, scrollLeft, 500); // 500ms để hiệu ứng mượt hơn
    }
  };

  //
  return (
    <>
      {/* img priority  */}
      <div className="relative">
        <img
          className="w-full md:h-[800px] h-[600px] object-cover object-[80%] md:object-center"
          src="/images/example/img_domestics-express_wrapper.png"
          alt="img international service"
        />
        <div className=" absolute lg:top-[120px] md:top-[100px] md:left-[120px] left-[40px] md:bottom-[0px] bottom-[120px] right-[40px]">
          <div className="text-white max-w-[730px]">
            <div className="font-[800] md:text-[72px] text-[36px] md:leading-[98px] leading-normal opacity-0 fade-in flex flex-col">
              <h2>
                {__t("solutions.domestic-express.banner_1", translations)}
              </h2>
              <h2>
                {__t("solutions.domestic-express.banner_2", translations)}
              </h2>
            </div>
            <div className="font-[500] md:text-[20px] text-[16px] md:leading-[27px] leading-normal md:mt-[20px] mt-[16px] opacity-0 fade-in-delay-1">
              {__t("solutions.domestic-express.banner_content", translations)}
            </div>
            <div className="opacity-0 fade-in-delay-2 md:mt-[48px] mt-[24px]">
              <a
                href="#contact-form"
                title={__t(
                  "solutions.international-service.get_a_quote",
                  translations
                )}
                onClick={(e) => {
                  e.preventDefault(); // Ngăn chặn hành vi mặc định

                  const formElement = document.getElementById("contact-form");
                  if (formElement) {
                    const yOffset = -100; // Thêm khoảng cách 100px
                    const targetPosition =
                      formElement.getBoundingClientRect().top +
                      window.scrollY +
                      yOffset;
                    const startPosition = window.scrollY;
                    const distance = targetPosition - startPosition;
                    let startTime: any = null;

                    function smoothScroll(currentTime: any) {
                      if (!startTime) startTime = currentTime;
                      const timeElapsed = currentTime - startTime;
                      const duration = 800; // Thời gian cuộn (ms)
                      const easeInOutQuad = (t: any) =>
                        t < 0.5 ? 2 * t * t : 1 - Math.pow(-2 * t + 2, 2) / 2;

                      const run =
                        startPosition +
                        distance * easeInOutQuad(timeElapsed / duration);
                      window.scrollTo(0, run);

                      if (timeElapsed < duration)
                        requestAnimationFrame(smoothScroll);
                    }

                    requestAnimationFrame(smoothScroll);
                  }
                }}
                className="px-[48px] py-[16px] bg-pcsMain rounded-[8px] font-bold text-[16px] hover-gradient inline-block text-center"
              >
                {__t(
                  "solutions.international-service.get_a_quote",
                  translations
                )}
              </a>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        {/* Băng truyền */}
        <div className="conveyor">
          <div className="conveyor-icon">
            <div className="marquee">
              <div className="marquee-content">
                {[...dataScroll, ...dataScroll, ...dataScroll].map(
                  (item: any, index: number) => (
                    <div key={index} className="marquee-item">
                      <img
                        src={item.image}
                        alt={`${index}`}
                        className="w-full h-auto"
                      />
                    </div>
                  )
                )}
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      {/* Sự khác biệt từ PCS */}
      <div className="px-paddingMobile md:px-paddingDesktop mt-[120px] md:mt-[176px]">
        <div className="text-pcsText font-light md:text-[64px] text-[40px] leading-[48px]  md:leading-normal">
          <span>
            {__t("solutions.domestic-express.different", translations)}
          </span>{" "}
          <span className={"text-pcsMain font-semibold"}>
            {__t("solutions.domestic-express._from", translations)}
          </span>
        </div>
        <div
          className={
            "md:px-paddingDesktop px-[24px] mt-[24px] text-pcsText font-normal md:text-[16px] text-[15px] grid grid-cols-12"
          }
          style={{ lineHeight: "24px" }}
        >
          <div className={"md:col-span-6"} />
          <div className={"col-span-12 md:col-span-6 max-w-[725px]"}>
            <div className="flex flex-col gap-[4px] ">
              {__t(
                "solutions.domestic-express.different_content",
                translations
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      {/* Sự khác biệt từ PCS (hình ảnh) */}
      <div className="md:mt-[36px] mt-[24px] domestic-express-diffrence">
        <div>
          <div className="relative">
            <img
              src="/images/example/img_domestic-express_diffrence.png"
              alt="video"
              className="w-full object-cover object-center rounded-[32px] max-[1024px]:h-[400px] max-[1024px]:object-[70%] h-[828px]"
            />
            <div className="absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center cursor-pointer select-none">
              <div className="relative">
                <div className="absolute inset-0 animate-pulse-circle"></div>
                <div className="absolute inset-0 animate-pulse-circle delay-300"></div>
                <svg
                  width="160"
                  height="160"
                  viewBox="0 0 160 160"
                  fill="none"
                  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                  className="relative z-1"
                >
                  <circle opacity="0.6" cx="80" cy="80" r="80" fill="#FBDBD6" />

                  <circle opacity="0.8" cx="80" cy="80" r="36" fill="white" />
                  <path
                    d="M71 90.1687V69.8313C70.9973 69.4697 71.1351 69.1156 71.3958 68.8142C71.6565 68.5129 72.0283 68.2779 72.4639 68.1392C72.8995 68.0005 73.379 67.9644 73.8415 68.0356C74.3039 68.1067 74.7282 68.2818 75.0603 68.5386L88.3095 78.7164C88.7518 79.0575 89 79.519 89 80C89 80.481 88.7518 80.9425 88.3095 81.2836L75.0603 91.4614C74.7282 91.7182 74.3039 91.8933 73.8415 91.9644C73.379 92.0356 72.8995 91.9995 72.4639 91.8608C72.0283 91.7221 71.6565 91.4871 71.3958 91.1858C71.1351 90.8844 70.9973 90.5303 71 90.1687Z"
                    fill="#ED543E"
                  />
                </svg>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div className="domestic-express-diffrence-detail">
          {detailDiffrence.map((item: any, index: number) => (
            <div key={index} className="text-pcsText">
              <div className="flex justify-between items-center">

                </div>
                <div>{item.step}</div>
              </div>

                {__t(`${item.title}`, translations)}
              </div>
              <div className="mt-[12px] text-[16px]">

              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
      {/* Các giải pháp chuyển phát nhanh */}
      <div className="px-paddingMobile md:px-paddingDesktop mt-[60px] md:mt-[96px]">
        <div className="text-pcsText font-light md:text-[64px] text-[40px] leading-[48px]  md:leading-normal">
          <span>{__t("solutions.domestic-express.express", translations)}</span>{" "}
          <span className={"text-pcsMain font-semibold"}>
            {__t("solutions.domestic-express.delivery_solutions", translations)}
          </span>
        </div>
        <div
          className={
            "md:px-paddingDesktop px-[24px] mt-[24px] text-pcsText font-normal md:text-[16px] text-[15px] grid grid-cols-12"
          }
          style={{ lineHeight: "24px" }}
        >
          <div className={"md:col-span-6"} />
          <div className={"col-span-12 md:col-span-6 max-w-[725px]"}>
            <div className="flex flex-col gap-[4px] ">
              {__t("solutions.domestic-express.express_content", translations)}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      {/* Các giải pháp chuyển phát nhanh (chọn) */}
      <div className="mt-[96px]">
        <div className="relative">
          {isMobile768 ? (
            <>
              <img
                src="/images/example/img_domestics-express_bg_solution_mini.png"
                alt="bg solution"
                className="w-full px-[16px] h-[1000px]"
              />
            </>
          ) : (
            <img
              src="/images/example/img_domestics-express_bg_solution.png"
              alt="bg solution"
              className="bg-detailSolution"
            />
          )}

          <div className=" overflow-x-auto">
            <div className="button-selected transition-transform duration-300">
              {detailSolution.map((item: any, index: number) => (
                <div
                  key={index}
                  className={`group button-selected-item transition-all
                  ${
                    selected.id === item.id
                      ? "bg-[#EA3418] text-white"
                      : "bg-[#FEF3F1] text-pcsText hover:bg-[#EA3418] hover:text-white"
                  }`}
                  // onClick={() => {
                  //   setSelected(item);
                  //   let el: HTMLDivElement | null = document.querySelector(".button-selected");
                  //   if(el) {
                  //     el.style.transform = `translateX(-${index * 272}px)`
                  //   }
                  // }}
                  onClick={() => {
                    setSelected(item);
                    if (window.innerWidth < 640) {
                      let el: HTMLDivElement | null =
                        document.querySelector(".button-selected");

                      if (el) {
                        const container = el.parentElement;
                        if (container) {
                          const maxScroll =
                            container.scrollWidth - container.clientWidth;
                          const selectedElement = el.children[
                            index
                          ] as HTMLElement;

                          if (selectedElement) {
                            const selectedOffset = selectedElement.offsetLeft;
                            const selectedWidth = selectedElement.offsetWidth;
                            const containerWidth = container.clientWidth;

                            // Tính toán vị trí để button nằm giữa
                            let newTransform =
                              selectedOffset -
                              containerWidth / 2 +
                              selectedWidth / 2;

                            // Đảm bảo không cuộn quá giới hạn
                            if (newTransform > maxScroll) {
                              newTransform = maxScroll;
                            }
                            if (newTransform < 0) {
                              newTransform = 0;
                            }

                            container.scrollTo({
                              left: newTransform,
                              behavior: "smooth",
                            });
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }}
                  // onClick={() => {
                  //   setSelected(item);

                  //   let el: HTMLDivElement | null = document.querySelector(".button-selected");

                  //   if (el) {
                  //     const selectedElement = el.children[index] as HTMLElement;

                  //     if (selectedElement) {
                  //       const selectedOffset = selectedElement.offsetLeft;
                  //       const selectedWidth = selectedElement.offsetWidth;
                  //       const containerWidth = el.clientWidth;

                  //       let newLeft = selectedOffset - containerWidth / 2 + selectedWidth / 2;

                  //       // Giới hạn left không vượt quá phạm vi
                  //       const maxLeft = el.scrollWidth - containerWidth;
                  //       if (newLeft > maxLeft) newLeft = maxLeft;
                  //       if (newLeft < 0) newLeft = 0;

                  //       el.style.left = `-${newLeft}px`;
                  //       el.style.transform = `translateX(${newLeft}px)`;
                  //     }
                  //   }
                  // }}
                >
                  <div
                    className={` transition-all 
          ${
            selected.id === item.id
              ? "text-white"
              : "text-pcsMain group-hover:text-white"
          }`}
                  >
                    {item.icon}
                  </div>

                  <div>{__t(`${item.title}`, translations)}</div>
                </div>
              ))}
            </div>
          </div>

          {selected ? (
            <div className="selected-detailSolution">
              <div className="with-item">
                <h2 className="md:text-[40px] text-[32px] font-[700]">
                  {__t(`${selected.title}`, translations)}
                </h2>
                <p className="mt-[22px] text-[16px]">
                  {__t(`${selected.content}`, translations)}
                </p>
                <ul className="mt-[24px] selected-detailSolution-list">
                  {selected.list.map((item: string, index: number) => (
                    <li key={index} className="flex gap-[12px]">
                      <svg
                        width="24"
                        height="24"
                        viewBox="0 0 24 24"
                        fill="none"
                        xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                      >
                        <path
                          fill-rule="evenodd"
                          clip-rule="evenodd"
                          d="M12 24C18.6274 24 24 18.6274 24 12C24 5.37258 18.6274 0 12 0C5.37258 0 0 5.37258 0 12C0 18.6274 5.37258 24 12 24ZM17.5104 8.95259C17.8156 8.56024 17.7449 7.99479 17.3526 7.68962C16.9602 7.38446 16.3948 7.45514 16.0896 7.8475L11.2812 14.0297C11.1743 14.1672 10.9731 14.185 10.8437 14.0685L7.80208 11.3311C7.43262 10.9986 6.86356 11.0285 6.53104 11.398C6.19853 11.7674 6.22848 12.3365 6.59794 12.669L9.63956 15.4065C10.5457 16.222 11.9536 16.0971 12.702 15.1348L17.5104 8.95259Z"
                          fill="white"
                        />
                      </svg>
                      {__t(`${item}`, translations)}
                    </li>
                  ))}
                </ul>
                <div>
                  <Link
                    title={__t(`${selected.title}`, translations)}
                    href={selected.link}
                    className="text-center w-[190px] md:mt-[52px] mt-[24px] py-[17px] bg-white text-[#ED543E] font-bold rounded-[8px] hover:bg-[#FEF3F1] hover:text-pcsText flex items-center justify-center"
                  >
                    {__t("solutions.domestic-express.see", translations)}
                  </Link>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div className="with-item">
                <img
                  src={selected.image}
                  alt={selected.id}
                  className="max-h-[440px]"
                />
              </div>
            </div>
          ) : null}
        </div>
      </div>
      {/* Quy trình gửi hàng */}
      <div className="px-paddingMobile md:px-paddingDesktop mt-[60px] md:mt-[96px]">
        <div className="text-pcsText font-light md:text-[64px] text-[40px] leading-[48px]  md:leading-normal">
          <span>{__t("solutions.domestic-express.process", translations)}</span>{" "}
          <span className={"text-pcsMain font-semibold"}>
            {__t("solutions.domestic-express.shipping", translations)}
          </span>
        </div>
        <div
          className={
            "md:px-paddingDesktop px-[24px] mt-[24px] text-pcsText font-normal md:text-[16px] text-[15px] grid grid-cols-12"
          }
          style={{ lineHeight: "24px" }}
        >
          <div className={"md:col-span-12"} />
          <div className={"col-span-12 md:col-span-6 min-[1600px]:pl-[128px]"}>
            <div className="">
              {__t("solutions.domestic-express.process_shipping", translations)}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      {/* Quy trình gửi hàng (process) */}
      <div className="min-[1600px]:mb-[316px] min-[1600px]:mt-[60px]">
        {!isMobile1600 ? (
          <div className="relative flex justify-center">
            <svg
              className="with-process"
              viewBox="0 0 826 385"
              fill="none"
              xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
            >
              <path
                d="M1 381.983C26.2318 384.11 96.052 375.495 173.478 324.016C270.26 259.667 380.018 250.095 470.853 263.39C561.688 276.685 636.302 227.227 681.719 120.866C718.053 35.7765 792.379 6.34989 825 2.27271"
                stroke="#ED543E"
                stroke-width="4"
              />
            </svg>

            <div className="absolute-process-1">
              <div>
                <img src={process[0].icon} alt="process 1" />
              </div>
              <div className="mt-[12px] font-[700] text-[24px]">
                {__t(`${process[0].title}`, translations)}
              </div>
              <div className="mt-[12px]">
                {__t(`${process[0].content}`, translations)}
              </div>
            </div>

            <div className="absolute-process-2">
              <div>
                <img src={process[1].icon} alt="process 1" />
              </div>
              <div className="min-[1600px]:mt-[40px]  mt-[12px] font-[700] text-[24px]">
                {__t(`${process[1].title}`, translations)}
              </div>
              <div className="mt-[12px]">
                {__t(`${process[1].content}`, translations)}
              </div>
            </div>

            <div className="absolute-process-3">
              <div>
                <img src={process[2].icon} alt="process 1" />
              </div>
              <div className="mt-[12px] font-[700] text-[24px]">
                {__t(`${process[2].title}`, translations)}
              </div>
              <div className="mt-[12px]">
                {__t(`${process[2].content}`, translations)}
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        ) : (
          <div className="mt-[48px] min-[1200px]:px-[208px] min-[1024px]:px-[108px] px-[40px] flex flex-col max-[500px]:gap-[40px] gap-[20px]">
            {process.map((item: any, index: number) => (
              <div key={index}>
                <div className="process-mobi">
                  <div className="w-[285px] md:h-[260px] h-auto flex-shrink-0">
                    <img
                      src={item.icon}
                      alt={`${index}`}
                      className="w-full h-full object-cover"
                    />
                  </div>
                  <div>
                    <div className="font-[700] md:text-[28px] text-[24px]">
                      {__t(`${item.title}`, translations)}
                    </div>
                    <div className="md:mt-[20px] mt-[16px] md:text-[20px] text-[16px]">
                      {__t(`${item.content}`, translations)}
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
                {/* <div className="border border-t-[#D1D5DB] my-[20px]"></div> */}
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
      {/* Các con số ấn tượng */}
      <div className="mt-[60px] md:mt-[96px]">
        <div className="relative">
          <img
            src="/images/example/img_domestic-express_bg_number.png"
            alt="bg number"
            className="w-full md:h-[440px] h-[600px]"
          />
          <div className="number-domestic">
            {dataNumber.map((item, index) => (
              <div key={index} className="flex flex-col gap-[8px] items-center">
                <div>{item.icon}</div>
                <CounterDataDifference
                  value={parseFloat(item.number)}
                  unit={item.unit}
                  className="count-data-domestic"
                />
                <div className="text-white text-[20px] mt-[8px] text-center">
                  {/* {item.content} */}
                  {__t(`${item.content}`, translations)}
                </div>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      {/* Câu chuyện khách hàng */}
      <div className="px-paddingMobile md:px-paddingDesktop mt-[60px] md:mt-[96px]">
        <div className="text-pcsText  font-light md:text-[64px] text-[40px] leading-[48px]  md:leading-normal">
          <span>{__t("solutions.domestic-express.story", translations)}</span>{" "}
          <span className={"text-pcsMain font-semibold"}>
            {__t("solutions.domestic-express.customer", translations)}
          </span>
        </div>
        <div className="md:mt-[48px] mt-[32px] history-domestic ">
          <div className="relative overflow-hidden rounded-[32px]">
            <div
              className="flex transition-transform duration-500 ease-in-out "
              // style={{ transform: `translateX(-${currentIndex * 100}%)` }}
              style={{
                transform: isMobile
                  ? `translateX(-${currentIndex * 100}vw)`
                  : `translateX(-${currentIndex * 100}%)`,
                width: isMobile
                  ? `${imgHistoryCustomer.length * 100}vw`
                  : "100%",
              }}
            >
              {imgHistoryCustomer.map((item, index) => (
                <img
                  key={index}
                  src={item.image}
                  alt={`slide-${index}`}
                  className="w-full md:h-[584px] h-[400px]"
                  style={{
                    width: isMobile ? "100vw" : "100%",
                    flex: "0 0 auto",
                  }}
                />
              ))}
            </div>
            <button
              onClick={prevSlide}
              className="absolute bottom-[5%] left-[10%] md:left-[36%] min-[1800px]:left-[40%] min-[1200px]:left-[38%]"
            >
              <svg
                width="48"
                height="48"
                viewBox="0 0 48 48"
                fill="none"
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
              >
                <circle cx="24" cy="24" r="24" fill="#ED543E" />
                <path
                  d="M20.6667 31L14 24M14 24L20.6667 17M14 24L34 24"
                  stroke="white"
                  stroke-width="2"
                  stroke-linecap="round"
                  stroke-linejoin="round"
                />
              </svg>
            </button>
            <button
              onClick={nextSlide}
              className="absolute bottom-[5%] right-[10%] md:right-[36%] min-[1800px]:right-[40%] min-[1200px]:right-[38%]"
            >
              <svg
                width="48"
                height="48"
                viewBox="0 0 48 48"
                fill="none"
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
              >
                <circle cx="24" cy="24" r="24" fill="#ED543E" />
                <path
                  d="M27.3333 31L34 24M34 24L27.3333 17M34 24L14 24"
                  stroke="white"
                  stroke-width="2"
                  stroke-linecap="round"
                  stroke-linejoin="round"
                />
              </svg>
            </button>
          </div>
          <div>
            <div className="md:px-[0px] px-[24px]">
              {__t("solutions.domestic-express.story_content", translations)}
            </div>
            <div className="relative mt-[48px] overflow-hidden">
              <img
                src="/images/example/img_domestic-express_history_customer_bg.png"
                alt="bg history customer"
                className="w-full md:h-[360px] h-[360px]"
              />
               <div className="absolute top-[4px] right-[56px] w-[80px] h-[80px]">
                <img
                  src={historyCustomer[currentIndexHistory].avatar}
                  alt="avatar"
                  className="w-full h-full"
                />
              </div>
              {/* 
              <div className="absolute top-[4px] right-[56px] w-[80px] h-[80px]">
                <img
                  src={historyCustomer[currentIndexHistory].avatar}
                  alt="avatar"
                  className="w-full h-full"
                />
              </div>
              <div className="absolute top-[120px] md:left-[56px] left-[20px] md:right-[56px] right-[20px] text-[16px]">
                {__t(
                  `${historyCustomer[currentIndexHistory].content}`,
                  translations
                )}
              </div>
              <div className="absolute bottom-[24px] md:left-[56px] left-[20px]">
                <div className="font-[700]">
                  {__t(
                    `${historyCustomer[currentIndexHistory].name}`,
                    translations
                  )}
                </div>
                <div className="mt-[4px]">
                  {__t(
                    `${historyCustomer[currentIndexHistory].company}`,
                    translations
                  )}
                </div>
              </div> */}
              <div className="absolute md:bottom-[36px] bottom-[20px] left-[0px] w-full overflow-hidden">
              
                <div className="overflow-hidden">
                  <div
                    className="flex transition-transform duration-500 ease-in-out"
                    style={{
                      transform: `translateX(-${currentIndexHistory * 100}%)`,
                    }}
                  >
                    {historyCustomer.map((item: any, index: number) => (
                      <div
                        key={index}
                        className="min-w-full md:px-[56px] px-[32px] flex flex-col justify-end"
                      >
                        <div className="">
                          {__t(`${item.content}`, translations)}
                        </div>
                        <div className="md:mt-[32px] mt-[24px]">
                          <div className="font-[700]">
                            {__t(`${item.name}`, translations)}
                          </div>
                          <div className="mt-[4px]">
                            {__t(`${item.company}`, translations)}
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    ))}
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div className="flex flex-row gap-[32px] md:mt-[32px] mt-[20px] md:ml-[56px] ml-[16px]">
              <button
                className="select-none flex flex-row gap-[12px] items-center"
                onClick={prevSlideHistory}
              >
                <div>
                  {__t("solutions.domestic-express.prev", translations)}
                </div>
                <div>
                  <svg
                    width="26"
                    height="18"
                    viewBox="0 0 26 18"
                    fill="none"
                    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                  >
                    <path
                      d="M9 17L1 9M1 9L9 0.999998M1 9L25 9"
                      stroke="#ED543E"
                      stroke-linecap="round"
                      stroke-linejoin="round"
                    />
                  </svg>
                </div>
              </button>
              <button
                className="select-none flex flex-row gap-[12px] items-center"
                onClick={nextSlideHistory}
              >
                <div>
                  <svg
                    width="26"
                    height="18"
                    viewBox="0 0 26 18"
                    fill="none"
                    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                  >
                    <path
                      d="M17 17L25 9M25 9L17 0.999998M25 9L1 9"
                      stroke="#ED543E"
                      stroke-linecap="round"
                      stroke-linejoin="round"
                    />
                  </svg>
                </div>
                <div>
                  {__t("solutions.domestic-express.next", translations)}
                </div>
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      {/* Câu hỏi thường gặp */}
      <div className="px-paddingMobile md:px-paddingDesktop mt-[60px] md:mt-[96px]">
        <div className="text-pcsText font-light md:text-[64px] text-[40px] leading-[48px]  md:leading-normal">
          <span>
            {__t("solutions.domestic-express.question", translations)}
          </span>{" "}
          <span className={"text-pcsMain font-bold"}>
            {__t("solutions.domestic-express.fqa", translations)}
          </span>
        </div>
        <div
          className={
            "md:px-paddingDesktop px-[24px] mt-[24px] text-pcsText font-normal md:text-[16px] text-[15px] grid grid-cols-12"
          }
          style={{ lineHeight: "24px" }}
        >
          <div className={"md:col-span-6"} />
          <div className={"col-span-12 md:col-span-6 max-w-[725px]"}>
            {__t("solutions.domestic-express.question_content", translations)}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      {/* Câu hỏi thường gặp (mở rộng) */}
      <div className="md:mt-[48px] mt-[24px] question-international">
        <div className="flex flex-col justify-between gap-[12px]">
          {questions.map((item: any, index: number) => (
            <div key={index}>
              {openIndex !== index ? (
                // Trạng thái bình thường (ô trắng)
                <div
                  className="question-domestic  cursor-pointer select-none flex justify-between items-center"
                  onClick={() => toggleQuestion(index)}
                >
                  <div className="text-pcsText font-[700] md:text-[20px] text-[16px]">
                    {__t(`${item.question}`, translations)}
                  </div>
                  <div>
                    <svg
                      width="56"
                      height="56"
                      viewBox="0 0 56 56"
                      fill="none"
                      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                    >
                      <circle cx="28" cy="28" r="28" fill="#FEF3F1" />
                      <path
                        d="M28 16V40M40 28L16 28"
                        stroke="#ED543E"
                        stroke-width="2"
                        stroke-linecap="round"
                        stroke-linejoin="round"
                      />
                    </svg>
                  </div>
                </div>
              ) : (
                // Trạng thái mở rộng (ô đỏ)
                <div className="mb-[20px]">
                  <div className="flex flex-row justify-between items-center gap-[12px] bg-[#ED543E] rounded-[100px] px-[32px] py-[26px]">
                    <div className="font-[700] md:text-[20px] text-[16px] text-white">
                      {__t(`${item.question}`, translations)}
                    </div>
                    <div
                      className="cursor-pointer select-none"
                      onClick={() => toggleQuestion(index)}
                    >
                      <svg
                        width="56"
                        height="56"
                        viewBox="0 0 56 56"
                        fill="none"
                        xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                      >
                        <circle
                          opacity="0.5"
                          cx="28"
                          cy="28"
                          r="28"
                          fill="#FEF3F1"
                        />
                        <path
                          d="M40 28H16"
                          stroke="white"
                          stroke-width="2"
                          stroke-linecap="round"
                          stroke-linejoin="round"
                        />
                      </svg>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div className="md:pt-[32px] pt-[24px] pr-[32px] pl-[32px] md:text-[16px] text-[15px]">
                    {__t(`${item.answer}`, translations)}
                  </div>
                  <div className="mt-[20px]">
                    <a
                      href={item.link}
                      target="_blank"
                      rel="noopener noreferrer"
                      className="text-pcsMain md:text-[16px] text-[15px] font-[700] cursor-pointer flex flex-row items-center gap-[4px] px-[32px]"
                    >
                      {__t("solutions.domestic-express.see_more", translations)}
                      <div className="mt-[2px]">
                        <svg
                          width="12"
                          height="10"
                          viewBox="0 0 12 10"
                          fill="none"
                          xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                        >
                          <path
                            d="M1 1L5 5L1 9"
                            stroke="#ED543E"
                            stroke-width="1.5"
                            stroke-linecap="round"
                            stroke-linejoin="round"
                          />
                          <path
                            d="M7 1L11 5L7 9"
                            stroke="#ED543E"
                            stroke-width="1.5"
                            stroke-linecap="round"
                            stroke-linejoin="round"
                          />
                        </svg>
                      </div>
                    </a>
                  </div>
                </div>
              )}
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
        <div className="flex flex-col justify-between gap-[20px]">
          <div className="text-white bg-gradient-to-b from-[#D82E14] to-[#F17B69] rounded-[32px] md:px-[56px] px-[32px] md:py-[86px] py-[28px] flex flex-col items-center justify-center text-center">
            <div>
              <svg
                className="ringring"
                width="60"
                height="60"
                viewBox="0 0 60 60"
                fill="none"
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
              >
                <path
                  d="M24.4017 60C22.7265 60 21.1351 59.164 20.0463 57.687L16.696 53.2281C16.696 53.256 16.5563 53.1724 16.5005 53.1724H15.4675C5.91898 53.1724 0 50.5807 0 37.7335V26.5864C0 14.8539 7.17537 11.7884 13.206 11.259C13.8761 11.1754 14.6578 11.1475 15.4675 11.1475H33.336C43.4429 11.1475 48.8035 16.4981 48.8035 26.5864V37.7335C48.8035 38.5417 48.7755 39.322 48.6638 40.0744C48.1613 46.0103 45.0902 53.1724 33.336 53.1724H32.2192L28.7572 57.687C27.6683 59.164 26.0769 60 24.4017 60ZM15.4675 15.3277C14.8253 15.3277 14.2111 15.3555 13.6248 15.4113C7.14743 15.9686 4.18794 19.5079 4.18794 26.5864V37.7335C4.18794 47.2923 7.14744 48.9922 15.4675 48.9922H16.5843C17.8406 48.9922 19.2645 49.6889 20.0463 50.6921L23.3966 55.1789C24.0109 56.0149 24.7926 56.0149 25.4069 55.1789L28.7572 50.72C29.5668 49.6332 30.8512 48.9922 32.2192 48.9922H33.336C40.4276 48.9922 43.9734 46.0103 44.5039 39.6564C44.5876 38.9876 44.6156 38.3745 44.6156 37.7335V26.5864C44.6156 18.8112 41.1256 15.3277 33.336 15.3277H15.4675Z"
                  fill="white"
                />
                <path
                  d="M24.4018 36.0609C22.8383 36.0609 21.6099 34.8068 21.6099 33.2741C21.6099 31.7414 22.8662 30.4873 24.4018 30.4873C25.9374 30.4873 27.1938 31.7414 27.1938 33.2741C27.1938 34.8068 25.9653 36.0609 24.4018 36.0609Z"
                  fill="white"
                />
                <path
                  d="M33.3369 36.0609C31.7734 36.0609 30.5449 34.8068 30.5449 33.2741C30.5449 31.7414 31.8013 30.4873 33.3369 30.4873C34.8725 30.4873 36.1288 31.7414 36.1288 33.2741C36.1288 34.8068 34.8725 36.0609 33.3369 36.0609Z"
                  fill="white"
                />
                <path
                  d="M15.4951 36.0609C13.9316 36.0609 12.7031 34.8068 12.7031 33.2741C12.7031 31.7414 13.9595 30.4873 15.4951 30.4873C17.0307 30.4873 18.287 31.7414 18.287 33.2741C18.287 34.8068 17.0307 36.0609 15.4951 36.0609Z"
                  fill="white"
                />
                <path
                  d="M46.5989 41.9135C46.0405 41.9135 45.4821 41.6905 45.0912 41.2725C44.6445 40.8266 44.4491 40.1857 44.5329 39.5726C44.6166 38.9874 44.6445 38.3742 44.6445 37.7333V26.5861C44.6445 18.8109 41.1546 15.3274 33.365 15.3274H15.4964C14.8543 15.3274 14.2401 15.3553 13.6538 15.411C13.0396 15.4946 12.3974 15.2716 11.9507 14.8536C11.5039 14.4077 11.2526 13.7947 11.3085 13.1816C11.811 7.1621 14.9101 0 26.6643 0H44.5329C54.6398 0 60.0003 5.35068 60.0003 15.4389V26.5861C60.0003 38.3185 52.825 41.384 46.7944 41.9135C46.7106 41.9135 46.6547 41.9135 46.5989 41.9135ZM15.8315 11.1472H33.3371C43.444 11.1472 48.8046 16.4979 48.8046 26.5861V37.371C53.5509 36.2005 55.7845 32.717 55.7845 26.5861V15.4389C55.7845 7.66372 52.2945 4.1802 44.5049 4.1802H26.6364C20.4941 4.1802 17.0321 6.40964 15.8315 11.1472Z"

                />
              </svg>
            </div>
            <div className="font-[700] text-[24px] mt-[32px]">
              {__t(
                "solutions.international-service.question_difference",
                translations
              )}
            </div>
            <div className="text-[20px] mt-[24px]">
              {__t(
                "solutions.international-service.question_difference_content",
                translations
              )}
            </div>
            <button
              type="button"
              onClick={(e) => {
                e.preventDefault();

                if ((window as any).Tawk_API) {
                  (window as any).Tawk_API.maximize();
                } else {
                  console.warn("Tawk.to chưa load xong!");
                }
              }}
              className="flex font-[700] h-[52px] text-[16px] px-[48px] py-[17px] text-pcsMain hover:bg-[#FEF3F1] bg-[#FFFFFF] rounded-[8px] mt-[32px] hover:"
            >
              {__t("solutions.international-service.chat_now", translations)}
            </button>
          </div>
          <div className="md:p-[48px] p-[32px] flex flex-row gap-[36px] w-full bg-[#EFF1F4] rounded-[32px]">
            <a href="tel:1900599838">
              <svg
                className="ringring"
                width="72"
                height="72"
                viewBox="0 0 72 72"
                fill="none"
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
              >
                <circle cx="36" cy="36" r="36" fill="#ED543E" />
                <path
                  d="M49.958 44.862C49.958 45.366 49.846 45.884 49.608 46.388C49.37 46.892 49.062 47.368 48.656 47.816C47.97 48.572 47.214 49.118 46.36 49.468C45.52 49.818 44.61 50 43.63 50C42.202 50 40.676 49.664 39.066 48.978C37.456 48.292 35.846 47.368 34.25 46.206C32.64 45.03 31.114 43.728 29.658 42.286C28.216 40.83 26.914 39.304 25.752 37.708C24.604 36.112 23.68 34.516 23.008 32.934C22.336 31.338 22 29.812 22 28.356C22 27.404 22.168 26.494 22.504 25.654C22.84 24.8 23.372 24.016 24.114 23.316C25.01 22.434 25.99 22 27.026 22C27.418 22 27.81 22.084 28.16 22.252C28.524 22.42 28.846 22.672 29.098 23.036L32.346 27.614C32.598 27.964 32.78 28.286 32.906 28.594C33.032 28.888 33.102 29.182 33.102 29.448C33.102 29.784 33.004 30.12 32.808 30.442C32.626 30.764 32.36 31.1 32.024 31.436L30.96 32.542C30.806 32.696 30.736 32.878 30.736 33.102C30.736 33.214 30.75 33.312 30.778 33.424C30.82 33.536 30.862 33.62 30.89 33.704C31.142 34.166 31.576 34.768 32.192 35.496C32.822 36.224 33.494 36.966 34.222 37.708C34.978 38.45 35.706 39.136 36.448 39.766C37.176 40.382 37.778 40.802 38.254 41.054C38.324 41.082 38.408 41.124 38.506 41.166C38.618 41.208 38.73 41.222 38.856 41.222C39.094 41.222 39.276 41.138 39.43 40.984L40.494 39.934C40.844 39.584 41.18 39.318 41.502 39.15C41.824 38.954 42.146 38.856 42.496 38.856C42.762 38.856 43.042 38.912 43.35 39.038C43.658 39.164 43.98 39.346 44.33 39.584L48.964 42.874C49.328 43.126 49.58 43.42 49.734 43.77C49.874 44.12 49.958 44.47 49.958 44.862Z"
                  stroke="white"
                  stroke-width="2"
                  stroke-miterlimit="10"
                />
                <path
                  d="M45.1002 31.8004C45.1002 30.9604 44.4422 29.6724 43.4622 28.6224C42.5662 27.6564 41.3762 26.9004 40.2002 26.9004"
                  stroke="white"
                  stroke-width="2"
                  stroke-linecap="round"
                  stroke-linejoin="round"
                />
                <path
                  d="M50.0002 31.8C50.0002 26.382 45.6182 22 40.2002 22"
                  stroke="white"
                  stroke-width="2"
                  stroke-linecap="round"
                  stroke-linejoin="round"
                />
              </svg>
            </a>
            <div className="flex flex-col gap-[8px] md:text-[20px] text-[16px]">
              <div>
                {__t(
                  "solutions.international-service.support_247",
                  translations
                )}
              </div>
              <div className="font-[700] md:text-[32px] text-[20px]">24/7</div>
              <div>1900.599.838</div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      {/* Kết nối cùng PCS */}
      <div
        id="contact-form"
        className="px-paddingMobile md:px-paddingDesktop mt-[60px] md:mt-[96px] text-pcsText"
      >
        <div className="text-pcsText font-light md:text-[64px] text-[40px] leading-[48px] md:leading-normal">
          <span>
            {__t("solutions.international-service.connect", translations)}
          </span>{" "}
          <span className={"text-pcsMain font-semibold"}>
            {__t("solutions.international-service._pcs", translations)}
          </span>
        </div>
        <div className="md:mt-[40px] mt-[24px] form-international">
          <div
            className=" flex text-[16px] font-normal
                            flex flex-col md:gap-[56px] gap-[24px] md:mb-[0px] mb-[32px] md:px-[0px] px-[24px]"
            style={{
              lineHeight: "24px",
            }}
          >
            <div className="md:text-[16px] text-[15px]">{__t("contact_us._content_2", translations)}</div>

            <div className="flex flex-col md:gap-[16px] gap-[8px]">
              <div className="font-semibold">
                {__t("contact_us.branch_hn", translations)}
              </div>
              <div>
                {__t("solutions.domestic-express.hanoi_banch", translations)}
              </div>
              <div className="contact-branch">
                <div className="flex flex-row gap-[8px]">
                  <svg
                    width="22"
                    height="22"
                    viewBox="0 0 22 22"
                    fill="none"
                    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                  >
                    <path
                      d="M21 18.7778V16.949C21 16.0403 20.4468 15.2232 19.6031 14.8857L17.3429 13.9816C16.2698 13.5524 15.0469 14.0174 14.53 15.0511L14.3333 15.4444C14.3333 15.4444 11.5556 14.8889 9.33333 12.6667C7.11111 10.4444 6.55556 7.66667 6.55556 7.66667L6.94891 7.46999C7.98264 6.95312 8.44762 5.73015 8.01838 4.65706L7.11432 2.39691C6.77685 1.55323 5.95971 1 5.05104 1H3.22222C1.99492 1 1 1.99492 1 3.22222C1 13.0406 8.95938 21 18.7778 21C20.0051 21 21 20.0051 21 18.7778Z"
                      stroke="#ED543E"
                      stroke-width="1.5"
                      stroke-linejoin="round"
                    />
                  </svg>{" "}
                  <span>1900.599.838</span>
                </div>
                <div className="flex flex-row gap-[8px]">
                  <svg
                    width="24"
                    height="24"
                    viewBox="0 0 24 24"
                    fill="none"
                    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                  >
                    <path
                      d="M6 8L9.7812 10.5208C11.1248 11.4165 12.8752 11.4165 14.2188 10.5208L18 8M6 21H18C20.2091 21 22 19.2091 22 17V7C22 4.79086 20.2091 3 18 3H6C3.79086 3 2 4.79086 2 7V17C2 19.2091 3.79086 21 6 21Z"
                      stroke="#ED543E"
                      stroke-width="1.5"
                      stroke-linecap="round"
                      stroke-linejoin="round"
                    />
                  </svg>{" "}
                  <span>info@pcs.vn</span>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>

            <div className="flex flex-col md:gap-[16px] gap-[8px]">
              <div className="font-semibold">
                {__t("contact_us.branch_hcm", translations)}
              </div>
              <div>
                {__t("solutions.domestic-express.hcm_banch", translations)}
              </div>
              <div className="contact-branch">
                <div className="flex flex-row gap-[8px]">
                  <svg
                    width="22"
                    height="22"
                    viewBox="0 0 22 22"
                    fill="none"
                    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                  >
                    <path
                      d="M21 18.7778V16.949C21 16.0403 20.4468 15.2232 19.6031 14.8857L17.3429 13.9816C16.2698 13.5524 15.0469 14.0174 14.53 15.0511L14.3333 15.4444C14.3333 15.4444 11.5556 14.8889 9.33333 12.6667C7.11111 10.4444 6.55556 7.66667 6.55556 7.66667L6.94891 7.46999C7.98264 6.95312 8.44762 5.73015 8.01838 4.65706L7.11432 2.39691C6.77685 1.55323 5.95971 1 5.05104 1H3.22222C1.99492 1 1 1.99492 1 3.22222C1 13.0406 8.95938 21 18.7778 21C20.0051 21 21 20.0051 21 18.7778Z"
                      stroke="#ED543E"
                      stroke-width="1.5"
                      stroke-linejoin="round"
                    />
                  </svg>{" "}
                  <span>1900.599.838</span>
                </div>
                <div className="flex flex-row gap-[8px]">
                  <svg
                    width="24"
                    height="24"
                    viewBox="0 0 24 24"
                    fill="none"
                    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                  >
                    <path
                      d="M6 8L9.7812 10.5208C11.1248 11.4165 12.8752 11.4165 14.2188 10.5208L18 8M6 21H18C20.2091 21 22 19.2091 22 17V7C22 4.79086 20.2091 3 18 3H6C3.79086 3 2 4.79086 2 7V17C2 19.2091 3.79086 21 6 21Z"
                      stroke="#ED543E"
                      stroke-width="1.5"
                      stroke-linecap="round"
                      stroke-linejoin="round"
                    />
                  </svg>{" "}
                  <span>info@pcs.vn</span>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          {/* form */}
          <div className="width-form md:p-[32px] p-[20px] flex flex-col gap-[20px] bg-[#fef3f1] rounded-[32px] justify-start items-start text-[14px]">
            <label className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 md:gap-[40px] gap-[20px] w-full">
              <div className="flex-1">
                <span className="block">
                  {__t("contact_us.name", translations)}{" "}
                  <span className={"text-[red]"}>*</span>
                </span>
                <input
                  id={"name_business_sale_priority"}
                  type="email"
                  placeholder={__t("contact_us.enter_your_name", translations)}
                  className="h-[48px] px-[12px] w-full mt-1 border-0 bg-white placeholder:text-[#808080] rounded-[8px]"
                />
              </div>

              <div className="flex-1">
                <span className="block">
                  {__t("contact_us.email", translations)}{" "}
                  <span className={"text-[red]"}>*</span>
                </span>
                <input
                  id={"email_business_sale_priority"}
                  type="email"
                  placeholder={__t("contact_us.enter_your_email", translations)}
                  className="h-[48px] px-[12px] w-full mt-1 border-0 bg-white placeholder:text-[#808080] rounded-[8px]"
                />
              </div>
            </label>
            <label className="block w-full">
              <span className="block">
                {__t("contact_us.company", translations)}
              </span>
              <input
                id={"company_business_sale_priority"}
                placeholder={__t("contact_us.your_company", translations)}
                className="h-[48px] px-[12px] w-full mt-1 border-0 bg-white placeholder:text-[#808080] rounded-[8px]"
              />
            </label>
            <label className="block w-full">
              <span className="block">
                {__t("contact_us.phone", translations)}{" "}
              </span>
              <input
                id={"phone_business_sale_priority"}
                placeholder={__t(
                  "contact_us.enter_your_phone_number",
                  translations
                )}
                className="h-[48px] px-[12px] w-full mt-1 border-0 bg-white placeholder:text-[#808080] rounded-[8px]"
              />
            </label>
            <label className="block w-full">
              <span className="block">
                {__t("contact_us.note", translations)}
              </span>
              <textarea
                id={"note_business_sale_priority"}
                placeholder={__t("contact_us.enter_your_note", translations)}
                className="p-[12px] w-full mt-1 border-0 bg-white placeholder:text-[#808080] min-h-[160px] rounded-[8px]"
              />
            </label>
            <button
              onClick={() => {
                handleSubmitFormBusinessSale();
              }}
              className={
                "w-full rounded-[8px] hover-gradient flex items-center justify-center gap-2 bg-pcsMain text-white h-[52px] mt-[4px]"
              }
            >
              {loadingSubmit ? (
                <svg
                  className="w-5 h-5 text-white animate-spin"
                  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                  fill="none"
                  viewBox="0 0 24 24"
                >
                  <circle
                    className="opacity-25"
                    cx="12"
                    cy="12"
                    r="10"
                    stroke="currentColor"
                    strokeWidth="4"
                  ></circle>
                  <path
                    className="opacity-75"
                    fill="currentColor"
                    d="M4 12a8 8 0 018-8v8h8a8 8 0 11-16 0z"
                  ></path>
                </svg>
              ) : (
                <svg
                  width="22"
                  height="22"
                  viewBox="0 0 22 22"
                  fill="none"
                  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                >
                  <path
                    d="M5.82115 4.60583L15.379 1.41988C19.6682 -0.00986175 21.9986 2.33176 20.5801 6.62098L17.3942 16.1789C15.2552 22.6071 11.7428 22.6071 9.60377 16.1789L8.65812 13.3419L5.82115 12.3962C-0.60705 10.2572 -0.60705 6.75607 5.82115 4.60583Z"
                    stroke="white"
                    stroke-width="1.5"
                    stroke-linecap="round"
                    stroke-linejoin="round"
                  />
                  <path
                    d="M8.8728 12.8577L12.9031 8.81616"
                    stroke="white"
                    stroke-width="1.5"
                    stroke-linecap="round"
                    stroke-linejoin="round"
                  />
                </svg>
              )}{" "}
              <span className="font-semibold text-[16px]">
                {__t("contact_us.send", translations)}{" "}
              </span>
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      {/* status form */}
      <div
        className={`relative z-10 ${openMessage.title ? "" : "hidden"}`}
        aria-labelledby="modal-title"
        role="dialog"
        aria-modal="true"
      >
        <div
          className="fixed inset-0 bg-gray-500/75 transition-opacity"
          aria-hidden="true"
        ></div>
        <div className="fixed inset-0 z-10 w-screen overflow-y-auto">
          <div className="flex min-h-full items-end justify-center p-4 text-center sm:items-center sm:p-0">
            <div className="relative transform overflow-hidden rounded-lg bg-white text-left shadow-xl transition-all sm:my-8 sm:w-full sm:max-w-lg">
              <div className="bg-white px-4 pb-4 pt-5 sm:p-6 sm:pb-4">
                <div className="sm:flex sm:items-start">
                  {openMessage.icon}
                  <div className="mt-3 text-center sm:ml-4 sm:mt-0 sm:text-left">
                    <h3
                      className="text-base font-semibold text-gray-900"
                      id="modal-title"
                    >
                      {openMessage.title}
                    </h3>
                    <div className="mt-2">
                      <p className="text-sm text-gray-500">
                        {openMessage.description}
                      </p>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div className="bg-gray-50 px-4 py-3 sm:flex sm:flex-row-reverse sm:px-6">
                <button
                  onClick={() =>
                    setOpenMessage({
                      icon: <div />,
                      title: "",
                      description: "",
                    })
                  }
                  type="button"
                  className="inline-flex w-full justify-center rounded-md bg-pcsMain px-3 py-2 text-sm font-semibold text-white shadow-sm hover:opacity-90 sm:ml-3 sm:w-auto"
                >
                  {__t("contact_us.ok", translations)}
                </button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      {/* khoảng cách footer */}
      <div className="px-paddingMobile md:px-paddingDesktop md:mt-[96px] mt-[60px]" />
    </>
  );
};

export default DomesticExpress;
